short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dyslexia Launcher inspires you to be more productive. Open a new tab to be inspired with a beautiful photo and a famous quote.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a dyslexia-friendly dashboard with optimized reading comfort and easy navigation.

💙 FREE features
🌊 Soothing backgrounds designed to reduce visual stress
🌊 Clear, easy-to-read time and weather display
🌊 Flexible quick launch bar - position it where you want (top or bottom)
🌊 Customizable quick links to your favorite websites
🌊 Fully customizable layout that adapts to your needs
🌊 Private and secure (We don't collect or sell your data!)

⭐ Built with accessibility in mind, following research-based guidelines for dyslexia ⭐

Note: For the best experience, after installing, click the 'Keep it' button on the 'Change back to Google' notification. This will show your dyslexia-friendly new tab page as intended. 🙂

🛡️ Privacy & Security
We are committed to protecting your privacy. Any information gathered is used solely for core functionality and improving service quality. Your data is never sold to third parties.
